intro.introDescription: You will hear a low tone as the root note, followed by another note. You need to select the corresponding degree based on what you hear. In the settings at the top right corner, you can adjust the volume and practice content.
intro.challengeIntroDescription: In this mode, you need to complete at least 30 questions in one go with an accuracy of 90% or higher to be counted and unlock the next level. You can select the level in the settings.

home.title: Ear Trainer
home.Open Source Message: This is open source, feel free to visit the GitHub repository to raise feature requests

settings.repeatWhenAdvance: Repeat Current Note When Answered Correctly
settings.DeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete all local statistics data? This action cannot be undone.
